com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates

Class AbstractTemplateElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.templates.AbstractTemplateElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultActionElement, DefaultExpressionElement, DefaultTextElement

    public abstract class AbstractTemplateElement
extends Object
implements TemplateElement
    Helps implementing the template element interface.

      Creates an abstract template element.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getLibraryUrlAbbreviations()
      Returns a map of abbreviations for library URLs that are effective for this template element.

      Returns the line number in which this template element occurs in its template.

      Processes this template element, keeping the current template element in the template information up to date.
      protected abstract void processAsCurrent(Context context, Writer writer)
      Processes this template element, which is now the current template element.

    • Method Detail

      • getLibraryUrlAbbreviations

        public Map<String,String> getLibraryUrlAbbreviations()
        Description copied from interface: TemplateElement
        Returns a map of abbreviations for library URLs that are effective for this template element. It includes the URL abbreviations of this element's ancestors.
        Specified by:
        getLibraryUrlAbbreviations in interface TemplateElement
        Returns:
        all library URL abbreviations of this template element (may be empty, but not null)

      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber()
        Description copied from interface: TemplateElement
        Returns the line number in which this template element occurs in its template.
        Specified by:
        getLineNumber in interface TemplateElement
        Returns:
        the location of this template element in the template that contains it

      • process

        public void process(Context context,
           Writer writer)
             throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: TemplateElement
        Processes this template element, keeping the current template element in the template information up to date.
        Specified by:
        process in interface TemplateElement
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        writer - the writer to use
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when something goes wrong while processing this template element

      • processAsCurrent

        protected abstract void processAsCurrent(Context context,
                    Writer writer)
                                  throws AluminumException
        Processes this template element, which is now the current template element.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        writer - the writer to use
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when something goes wrong while processing this template element
